item.title: 早间竞价：随着 Nvidia 更新到期而喘口气
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

A cocktail of renewed AI excitement, Nvidia's (.NVDA) imminent earnings update, an impressive 20-year Treasury auction and a leveling off of crude oil prices has invigorated the holiday week.翻译:人工智能的新一轮兴奋、 英伟达 (Nvidia ) (.NVDA)即将发布的收益更新、令人印象深刻的 20 年期国债拍卖以及原油价格的平稳，为假期周注入了活力。

Intrigue and speculation over this year's artificial intelligence craze has gone up several gears since Friday's ouster of Sam Altman as boss of ChatGPT-developer OpenAI and his subsequent defection to the firm's biggest sponsor Microsoft (.MSFT) - fueling talk Big Tech will hoover up all the talent in the area.翻译:自上周五 ChatGPT 开发商 OpenAI 老板 Sam Altman 被罢黜，以及他随后投奔该公司最大赞助商微软(.MSFT)以来，关于今年人工智能热潮的阴谋和猜测已经升温——助长了有关大型科技公司将席卷一切的讨论。该地区的人才。

While the OpenAI boardroom row seems to center on the speed and openness of further AI development, amid some regulatory disquiet, the shift in key players lifted Microsoft and the other megacap tech names 1.5% on Monday (.NYFANG).翻译:尽管 OpenAI 董事会的争论似乎集中在人工智能进一步发展的速度和开放性上，但在一些监管方面的不安中，主要参与者的转变周一使微软和其他大型科技公司股价上涨 1.5% (.NYFANG) 。

And with semiconductor giant Nvidia expected to report another blockbuster earnings report after the bell on Tuesday - as the AI boom has seen explosive growth in demand for its high-end chips - Wall St stocks (.SPX), (.IXIC) powered to their highest close since Aug. 1.翻译:半导体巨头英伟达 (Nvidia) 预计将在周二盘后公布另一份重磅收益报告 - 由于人工智能热潮导致对其高端芯片的需求出现爆炸式增长 - 华尔街股票(.SPX) 、 (.IXIC)的表现强劲自 8 月 1 日以来的最高收盘价。

Nvidia is expected to report a nearly 173% jump in revenue for the third quarter, according to analysts polled by LSEG, and Wall Street estimates it will forecast a more than 195% rise in revenue for the current quarter. Its stock, which is up 240% this year, was up modestly ahead of Tuesday's open.翻译:根据伦敦证券交易所集团 (LSEG) 调查的分析师数据，英伟达第三季度收入预计将增长近 173%，而华尔街则预计当前季度收入将增长 195% 以上。其股价今年上涨了 240%，周二开盘前小幅上涨。

The S&P500's rally to almost four month highs on Monday - marking an 11% surge in less than four weeks and tracking year-to-date gains of some 18.5% - struggled for air in the futures market, where there was a slight downtick overnight.翻译:周一，标准普尔 500 指数涨至近四个月高位，在不到四周的时间里飙升了 11%，年初至今涨幅约为 18.5%，但在期货市场上举步维艰，隔夜小幅下跌。

But the other, only slightly more prosaic, craze around peak borrowing rates remained cause for optimism.翻译:但另一种稍微平淡的、围绕借贷利率峰值的狂热仍然令人乐观。

Decent demand for the $16 billion auction of often-unloved 20-year U.S. Treasury bonds on Monday saw long-term yields take another leg down, with 20-year yields themselves down almost 10 basis points since Friday to their lowest since Sept. 22.翻译:周一拍卖的 160 亿美元经常不受欢迎的 20 年期美国国债的需求旺盛，导致长期收益率再次下跌，20 年期国债收益率自周五以来已下跌近 10 个基点，至 9 月 22 日以来的最低水平。

Benchmark 10-year year yields nudged lower too toward recent two-month lows.翻译:基准10年期国债收益率也小幅走低，跌至近期两个月低点。

Helping keep the disinflation fires burning was a leveling off of the latest crude oil price bounce - with crude markets now focused on the weekend OPEC+ meeting. Still down 19% in less than two months, oil prices remain in the red year-on-year.翻译:最新的原油价格反弹趋于平稳，有助于保持通货紧缩的势头，原油市场现在关注的是周末的欧佩克+会议。不到两个月的时间仍下跌19%，油价仍同比下跌。

As to Federal Reserve thinking, the central bank is expected to issue minutes of its November meeting and will be scoured for clues to next steps as always. Even though the Fed stance is clearly evolving, there's a dearth of new data on the diary this week and the Thanksgiving holiday puts a hold on events.翻译:至于美联储的想法，预计央行将发布 11 月会议纪要，并将一如既往地寻找下一步行动的线索。尽管美联储的立场明显在变化，但本周缺乏新数据，而且感恩节假期使事件暂停。

The dollar (.DXY) continued to fall, however, with its DXY index down for the fourth day to its lowest since August. Dollar losses were broad based, but China's yuan appeared to lead the way to its strongest level since July 27.翻译:然而，美元（.DXY）继续下跌，其DXY指数连续第四天下跌至8月以来的最低水平。美元普遍下跌，但人民币似乎率先升至 7 月 27 日以来的最高水平。

Markets were surprised the People's Bank of China continued to support the yuan via its daily fixing despite the currency's sharp gains over the past week.翻译:尽管人民币在过去一周大幅上涨，但中国央行继续通过每日中间价来支持人民币，令市场感到惊讶。

Aside from speculation on peak U.S. interest rates, Chinese exporters' year-end hedging flows, some easing of Sino-U.S. tensions and increased China economic stimulus were all cited as bolstering the yuan.翻译:除了对美国利率峰值的猜测外，中国出口商的年底对冲资金流、中美紧张局势有所缓和以及中国加大经济刺激力度都被认为支撑了人民币汇率。

Overseas stocks, however, were relatively tame compared to the renewed fizz on Wall St.翻译:然而，与华尔街新一轮的繁荣相比，海外股市相对温和。

In Europe, sterling pushed higher ahead of expected tax cuts at Wednesday's budget speech from UK finance minister Jeremy Hunt. Britain borrowed less than predicted by its budget forecasters in the first seven months of the financial year, data showed on Tuesday - pointing to some fiscal loosening into what's likely to be an election year.翻译:在欧洲，英镑在英国财政部长杰里米·亨特周三的预算演讲预期减税之前走高。周二的数据显示， 英国在本财年的前七个月的借款低于预算预测者的预期，这表明在可能的选举年可能会出现一些财政宽松。

Italy on Monday sold a 25% stake in bailed-out Monte dei Paschi di Siena (BMPS.MI), raising 920 million euros ($1 billion) and advancing plans to re-privatise the world's oldest bank two years after a failed first attempt. Its stock fell.翻译:意大利周一出售了接受救助的锡耶纳银行(BMPS.MI) 25% 的股份，筹集了 9.2 亿欧元（10 亿美元），并推进了在首次尝试失败两年后将这家世界上最古老的银行重新私有化的计划。它的股票下跌了。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Tuesday:翻译:周二晚些时候将为美国市场提供更多方向的关键事态发展：

* Philadelphia Federal Reserve's service sector survey, Chicago Fed's Oct business index; Canada Oct inflation翻译:*费城联储服务业调查、芝加哥联储10月商业指数；加拿大10月通胀

* Fed releases minutes from the most-recent Federal Open Market Committee meeting; European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde and ECB board member Isabel Schnabel both speak翻译:* 美联储发布最近一次联邦公开市场委员会会议纪要；欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德和欧洲央行董事会成员伊莎贝尔·施纳贝尔均发表讲话

* U.S. Treasury auctions $15 billion in 10-year inflation-protected notes, 2-year floating rate notes翻译:* 美国财政部拍卖150亿美元10年期通胀保值票据、2年期浮动利率票据

* U.S. corporate earnings: Nvidia, Best Buy, Lowes, Autodesk, Analog Devices, Medtronic, Jacobs Solutions翻译:* 美国企业盈利：Nvidia、Best Buy、Lowes、Autodesk、Analog Devices、Medtronic、Jacobs Solutions

($1 = 0.9168 euros)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.9168 欧元）

item.title: 朝鲜人使用假名和脚本来获得远程 IT 工作以获取现金
item.description:
Using fake names, sham LinkedIn profiles, counterfeit work papers and mock interview scripts, North Korean IT workers seeking employment in Western tech companies are deploying sophisticated subterfuge to get hired.翻译:使用假名、虚假的 LinkedIn 个人资料、伪造的工作文件和模拟面试脚本，在西方科技公司寻求就业的朝鲜 IT 工人正在使用复杂的诡计来获得聘用。

Landing a job outside North Korea to secretly earn hard currency for the isolated country demands highly-developed strategies to convince Western hiring managers, according to documents reviewed by Reuters, an interview with a former North Korean IT worker and cybersecurity researchers.翻译:路透社查阅的文件、对一名前朝鲜 IT 员工和网络安全研究人员的采访显示，在朝鲜境外找到一份工作，秘密地为这个孤立的国家赚取硬通货，需要高度发达的策略来说服西方招聘经理。

North Korea has dispatched thousands of IT workers overseas, an effort that has accelerated in the last four years, to bring in millions to finance Pyongyang's nuclear missile programme, according to the United States, South Korea, and the United Nations.翻译:据美国、韩国和联合国称，朝鲜已向海外派遣了数千名 IT 员工，这一努力在过去四年中有所加快，为平壤的核导弹计划带来了数百万美元的资金。

"People are free to express ideas and opinions," reads one interview script used by North Korean software developers that offers suggestions for how to describe a "good corporate culture" when asked. Expressing one's thoughts freely could be met with imprisonment in North Korea.翻译:朝鲜软件开发人员使用的一份采访脚本写道：“人们可以自由地表达想法和意见。”该脚本在被问及如何描述“良好的企业文化”时提供了建议。在朝鲜自由表达自己的想法可能会被监禁。

The scripts totalling 30 pages, were unearthed by researchers at Palo Alto Networks (PANW.O), a U.S. cybersecurity firm which discovered a cache of internal documents online that detail the workings of North Korea's remote IT workforce.翻译:这些脚本总计 30 页，由美国网络安全公司 Palo Alto Networks (PANW.O)的研究人员发现，该公司在网上发现了一系列内部文档，详细介绍了朝鲜远程 IT 员工的工作情况。

The documents contain dozens of fraudulent resumes, online profiles, interview notes, and forged identities that North Korean workers used to apply for jobs in software development.翻译:这些文件包含数十份欺诈性简历、在线个人资料、面试记录以及朝鲜工人用来申请软件开发工作的伪造身份。

Reuters found further evidence in leaked darkweb data that revealed some of the tools and techniques used by North Korean workers to convince firms to employ them in jobs as far afield as Chile, New Zealand, the United States, Uzbekistan and the United Arab Emirates.翻译:路透社在泄露的暗网数据中发现了进一步的证据，这些数据揭示了朝鲜工人使用的一些工具和技术，以说服公司雇用他们远至智利、新西兰、美国、乌兹别克斯坦和阿拉伯联合酋长国。

The documents and data reveal the intense effort and subterfuge undertaken by North Korean authorities to ensure the success of a scheme that has become a vital lifeline of foreign currency for the cash-strapped regime.翻译:这些文件和数据揭示了朝鲜当局为确保一项计划取得成功而付出的巨大努力和诡计，该计划已成为该政权现金短缺的重要外汇生命线。

North Korea's U.N. mission did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:朝鲜驻联合国代表团没有回应置评请求。

Remote IT workers can earn more than ten times what a conventional North Korean labourer working overseas in construction or other manual jobs earns, the U.S. Justice Department (DOJ) said in 2022, and teams of them can collectively earn more than $3 million a year.翻译:美国司法部 (DOJ) 于 2022 年表示，远程 IT 工人的收入是在海外从事建筑或其他体力工作的传统朝鲜劳工收入的十倍以上，他们的团队每年的收入合计可超过 300 万美元。

Reuters was not able to determine how much the scheme has generated over the years.翻译:路透社无法确定该计划多年来产生了多少收益。

Some of the scripts, designed to prepare the workers for interview questions, contain excuses for the need to work remotely.翻译:一些旨在帮助员工应对面试问题的脚本包含需要远程工作的借口。

"Richard", a senior embedded software developer, said "I (flew) to Singapore several weeks ago. My parents got Covid and I (decided) to be with family members for a while. Now, I am planning to go back to Los Angeles in three months. I am thinking that I could start work remotely right now, then I will be on board when I go back to LA."翻译:高级嵌入式软件开发人员“理查德”说，“几周前我（飞往）新加坡。我的父母感染了新冠病毒，我（决定）与家人在一起一段时间。现在，我计划返回洛杉矶三个月后到达洛杉矶。我想我现在就可以开始远程工作，然后当我回到洛杉矶时我就会加入。”

A North Korean IT worker who recently defected also examined the documents and confirmed their authenticity to Reuters: "We would create 20 to 50 fake profiles a year until we were hired," he said.翻译:一名最近叛逃的朝鲜 IT 员工也检查了这些文件，并向路透社证实了其真实性：“我们每年都会创建 20 到 50 份虚假个人资料，直到我们被录用，”他说。

He viewed the scripts, data and documents and said it was exactly the same thing he had been doing because he recognised the tactics and techniques used.翻译:他查看了脚本、数据和文件，并表示这与他一直在做的事情完全相同，因为他认识到所使用的策略和技术。

"Once I was hired, I would create another fake profile to get a second job," said the worker, who spoke on condition of anonymity, citing security concerns.翻译:“一旦我被录用，我就会创建另一个虚假的个人资料来获得第二份工作，”这名工人说，他以安全问题为由要求匿名。

In October, the DOJ and Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) seized 17 website domains it said were used by North Korean IT workers to defraud businesses and $1.5 million in funds.翻译:10 月，司法部和联邦调查局 (FBI) 查封了17 个网站域名，据称这些网站域名被朝鲜 IT 员工用来诈骗企业和 150 万美元资金。

North Korean developers working at U.S. companies had hidden behind pseudonymous email and social media accounts and generated millions of dollars a year on behalf of sanctioned North Korean entities through the scheme, the DOJ said.翻译:美国司法部表示，在美国公司工作的朝鲜开发商隐藏在假名电子邮件和社交媒体账户后面，通过该计划代表受制裁的朝鲜实体每年赚取数百万美元。

"There is a risk to the North Korea government, as these privileged workers are exposed to dangerous realities about the world and their country's enforced backwardness," said Sokeel Park of Liberty in North Korea (LINK), an organisation that works with defectors.

HARD CASH

Last year, the U.S. government said North Korean IT workers were mainly located in China and Russia, with some in Africa and Southeast Asia, and can each earn up to $300,000 annually.翻译:去年，美国政府表示，朝鲜IT工人主要分布在中国和俄罗斯，也有一些分布在非洲和东南亚，每人年薪最高可​​达30万美元。

According to his experience, the former IT worker said all are expected to earn at least $100,000, of which 30-40% is repatriated to Pyongyang, 30-60% spent on overhead expenses, and 10-30% pocketed by workers.翻译:根据他的经验，这位前IT员工表示，预计所有人的收入至少为10万美元，其中30-40%被汇回平壤，30-60%用于管理费用，10-30%被工人收入囊中。

He estimated there were around 3,000 others like him overseas, and another 1,000 based within North Korea.翻译:他估计在海外大约有 3,000 名像他一样的人，另外还有 1,000 人在朝鲜境内。

"I worked to earn foreign currency," he told Reuters. "It differs between people but, basically, once you get a remote job you can work for as little as six months, or as long as three to four years."翻译:“我工作是为了赚取外汇，”他告诉路透社。 “这因人而异，但基本上，一旦你找到一份远程工作，你可以工作短则六个月，长则三到四年。”

"When you can't find a job, you freelance."翻译:“当你找不到工作时，你就成为自由职业者。”

The researchers, part of Palo Alto's Unit 42 cyber research division, made the discovery when examining a campaign by North Korean hackers that targeted software developers.翻译:帕洛阿尔托第 42 号网络研究部门的研究人员在检查朝鲜黑客针对软件开发商的活动时发现了这一情况。

One of the hackers left the documents exposed on a server, Unit 42 said, indicating there are links between North Korea's hackers and its IT workers, although the defector said espionage campaigns were for a select few: "Hackers are trained separately. Those missions are not given to people like us," he said.翻译:Unit 42 表示，其中一名黑客将文件暴露在服务器上，这表明朝鲜黑客与其 IT 员工之间存在联系，尽管该叛逃者表示间谍活动是针对少数人的：“黑客是单独接受培训的。这些任务是不给我们这样的人，”他说。

Still, there is crossover. The DOJ and FBI have warned that North Korean IT workers may use access to hack their employers, and some of the leaked resumes indicated experience at cryptocurrency firms, an industry that has been long-targeted by North Korean hackers.

FAKE IDENTITIES

Data from Constella Intelligence, an identity investigation firm, showed that one of the workers had accounts at over 20 freelancing websites in the United States, Britain, Japan, Uzbekistan, Spain, Australia and New Zealand.翻译:身份调查公司 Constella Intelligence 的数据显示，其中一名员工在美国、英国、日本、乌兹别克斯坦、西班牙、澳大利亚和新西兰的 20 多个自由职业网站上拥有账户。

The worker did not respond to an emailed request for comment.翻译:该员工没有回复通过电子邮件发送的置评请求。

The data, collated from leaks on the darkweb, also revealed an account on a website selling digital templates to create realistic-looking fake identification documents, including U.S. driving licences, visas and passports, Reuters found.翻译:路透社发现，这些从暗网上泄露的数据整理而来的数据还显示，一个网站上有一个帐户，该帐户出售数字模板，用于创建看起来逼真的虚假身份证明文件，包括美国驾驶执照、签证和护照。

The documents unearthed by Unit 42 included resumes for 14 identities, a forged U.S. green card, interview scripts, and evidence that some workers had bought access to legitimate online profiles in order to appear more genuine.翻译:Unit 42 揭露的文件包括 14 个身份的简历、一张伪造的美国绿卡、面试脚本，以及一些工人为了显得更真实而购买合法在线个人资料的证据。

The "Richard" in Singapore who was seeking remote IT work appeared to refer to a forged profile by the name of "Richard Lee" – the same name on the green card. The U.S. Department of Homeland Security did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:在新加坡寻求远程 IT 工作的“理查德”似乎指的是一个名为“理查德·李”的伪造个人资料——与绿卡上的名字相同。美国国土安全部没有回应置评请求。

Reuters found a LinkedIn account for a Richard Lee with the same profile photo who listed experience at Jumio, a digital identity verification company.翻译:路透社发现理查德·李 (Richard Lee) 的 LinkedIn 帐户具有相同的个人资料照片，该帐户列出了在数字身份验证公司 Jumio 的工作经历。

"We do not have any records of Richard Lee having been a current or former employee of Jumio," a Jumio spokesperson said. “Jumio does not have any evidence to suggest the company has ever had a North Korean employee within its workforce.”翻译:Jumio 发言人表示：“我们没有任何记录表明 Richard Lee 曾是 Jumio 的现任或前任员工。” “Jumio 没有任何证据表明该公司的员工队伍中曾经有过朝鲜员工。”

Reuters messaged the LinkedIn account seeking comment, but received no response. LinkedIn removed the account after receiving requests from Reuters for comment.翻译:路透社向 LinkedIn 账户发送消息寻求评论，但没有收到回复。 LinkedIn 在收到路透社的置评请求后删除了该帐户。

"Our team uses information from a variety of sources to detect and remove fake accounts, as we did in this case," a spokesperson said.翻译:一位发言人表示：“我们的团队使用各种来源的信息来检测和删除虚假帐户，就像我们在本案中所做的那样。”

item.title: 独家：中国国有银行将美元兑换成人民币
item.description:
China's major state-owned banks were seen exchanging yuan for U.S. dollars in the onshore swap market and selling those dollars in spot currency markets this week, two sources told Reuters on Tuesday.翻译:两名消息人士周二告诉路透社，中国主要国有银行本周在境内互换市场将人民币兑换成美元，并在即期货币市场出售这些美元。

The yuan has gained 2% in the past week, to stand at levels of around 7.13 to the dollar - its highest in nearly 4 months - and the big state banks have continued to sell dollars for yuan this week, the sources said.翻译:消息人士称，人民币兑美元汇率在过去一周上涨了 2%，达到 7.13 左右的水平，为近 4 个月来的最高水平，而大型国有银行本周继续抛售美元兑换人民币。

Both sources spoke on condition of anonymity as they were not authorised to speak to media about the matter.翻译:两位消息人士均不愿透露姓名，因为他们无权向媒体谈论此事。

State banks are often suspected of stepping into the currency market on behalf of the authorities, but the timing is unusual as they would usually sell dollars when the yuan was under pressure to depreciate.翻译:国有银行经常被怀疑代表当局介入货币市场，但时机不同寻常，因为它们通常会在人民币面临贬值压力时出售美元。

Their action over the past week came amid broad dollar weakness. The dollar index , which measures the currency's value against major trading partners, has retreated more than 3% in November, as U.S. yields succumb to signs of a peak in Federal Reserve monetary tightening.翻译:他们过去一周的行动是在美元普遍疲软的情况下采取的。由于美国国债收益率屈服于美联储货币紧缩政策见顶的迹象，衡量美元兑主要贸易伙伴汇率的美元指数11月份已回落超过3%。

Some market participants said state banks might be trying to speed the yuan's gains and spur exporters to convert more of their FX receipts into yuan. The Chinese currency is still down more than 3% against the dollar this year.翻译:一些市场参与者表示，国有银行可能正试图加速人民币升值，并刺激出口商将更多外汇收入兑换成人民币。今年人民币兑美元汇率仍下跌3%以上。

The selling of dollars by state banks caused the onshore spot yuan to briefly touch 7.1296 per dollar, firmer than its daily official guidance for the first time in four months.翻译:国有银行抛售美元导致在岸即期人民币兑美元短暂触及7.1296，四个月来首次高于每日官方指引。

The People's Bank of China (PBOC) has also been lowering the dollar-yuan daily fixing rate this week. On Tuesday, it set the midpoint at a 3-1/2-month low of 7.1406 per dollar.翻译:中国人民银行（PBOC）本周也降低了美元兑人民币每日中间价。周二，它将中点定为 3-1/2 个月低点 7.1406 美元兑美元。

"It is surprising to see they keep lowering the fixing at this rate. To me, it looks like they are doing preparatory work ahead of a policy rate cut," said Kiyong Seong, lead Asia macro strategist at Societe Generale.翻译:法国兴业银行首席亚洲宏观策略师 Kiyong Seong 表示：“令人惊讶的是，他们不断以这样的利率下调中间价。在我看来，他们似乎正在为政策利率下调做准备工作。”

"When the external environment is favourable, they appear to strengthen the CNY as much as possible."翻译:“当外部环境有利时，他们似乎会尽可能地强化人民币汇率。”

Recent data shows the recovery in the world's second-largest economy remains uneven and bumpy with industrial output and retail sales surprising on the upside in October, while manufacturing activity and consumer prices continued to fall.翻译:最新数据显示，世界第二大经济体的复苏仍然不平衡且崎岖不平，10月份工业产出和零售销售出人意料地上升，而制造业活动和消费者价格继续下降。

While the economy still needs more policy stimulus, analysts say further monetary easing could add downside pressure on the Chinese currency, given the wide differential between interest rates in China and other economies, particularly the United States.翻译:尽管经济仍需要更多政策刺激，但分析师表示，鉴于中国与其他经济体（尤其是美国）的利率差异巨大，进一步的货币宽松可能会增加人民币的下行压力。

The PBOC has been injecting cash through its medium-term lending facility (MLF) loans into the banking system, but has of late kept the rate on those loans unchanged.翻译:中国人民银行一直通过中期借贷便利（MLF）贷款向银行体系注入现金，但最近保持这些贷款利率不变。

"Some volatilities around this level could be likely at this time, unless there are more further significant downside dollar moves or additional major sentiment positive events," said Zhi Xiaojia, chief China economist at Credit Agricole.翻译:法国农业信贷银行(Credit Agricole)首席中国经济学家支晓佳表示，“除非美元进一步大幅下行或出现其他重大情绪积极事件，否则目前可能会在这一水平附近出现一些波动。”

"Indeed, the yield gap remains quite wide, and we are still expecting more policy easing, including PBOC rate and reserve requirement ratio (RRR) cut."翻译:“事实上，收益率差距仍然相当大，我们仍然预计会有更多政策宽松，包括央行降息和存款准备金率（RRR）。”

Zhi said she was "relatively constructive" on the yuan into the end of the year and in 2024.翻译:支表示，她对今年年底和2024年的人民币汇率“相对有建设性”。

Reporting by Shanghai Newsroom; Editing by Simon Cameron-Moore and Clarence Fernandez翻译:上海新闻编辑室报道；西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔和克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑

item.title: 路透调查显示，随着各国央行转向鸽派，经济衰退忧虑重重，欧洲股市将于 2024 年上涨
item.description:
Summary:
翻译:概括：

European equity markets are forecast to eke out a modest rise in 2024, a Reuters poll found, as optimism that global interest rates have peaked is offset by worries the economy could fall into a recession.翻译:路透调查发现，欧洲股市预计将在 2024 年小幅上涨，因为对全球利率已见顶的乐观情绪被对经济可能陷入衰退的担忧所抵消。

Fund managers and equity strategists surveyed Nov. 10-20 expect the pan-European benchmark STOXX 600 (.STOXX) index to rise to 475 points by the end of next year, implying a 4.1% increase from Monday's close at 456.26.翻译:11 月 10 日至 20 日接受调查的基金经理和股票策略师预计，泛欧基准 STOXX 600 (.STOXX)指数到明年年底将升至 475 点，较周一收盘价 456.26 点上涨 4.1%。

The Euro STOXX 50 index (.STOXX50E) of the 50 largest and most liquid stocks in Europe is seen rising by an even smaller 2.5%, to end next year at 4,450 points, the survey median found.翻译:调查中值发现，欧洲 50 只最大、流动性最强的股票的欧洲 STOXX 50 指数(.STOXX50E)预计上涨幅度更小，为 2.5%，明年收于 4,450 点。

In 2023, Europe's main indexes have had a broadly positive year, with the STOXX 600 gaining over 7% and the Euro STOXX 50 over 14%, much of the rally arriving at the beginning of the year when Europe's economy was seen benefitting from China's reopening.翻译:2023年，欧洲主要指数总体上表现良好，斯托克600指数上涨超过7%，欧洲斯托克50指数上涨超过14%，其中大部分反弹出现在年初，当时欧洲经济受益于中国的重新开放。

But the euro zone's economic headwinds gathered momentum through 2023, and Germany - the bloc's industrial heartland - appears to be the biggest drag given its energy-intensive heavy industry, which relies on cheap gas and external demand for growth.翻译:但到2023年，欧元区的经济逆风将愈发强劲，而欧元区的工业中心德国——鉴于其能源密集型重工业（依赖廉价天然气和外部需求来实现增长）似乎是最大的拖累。

"A slowdown in growth is still the base case for 2024," said Chris Beauchamp, chief market strategist at IG, "though a recession might yet be avoided if energy prices ease and the European Central Bank employs some judiciously cautious rate cuts."翻译:IG首席市场策略师Chris Beauchamp表示：“增长放缓仍然是2024年的基本情况，但如果能源价格回落并且欧洲央行采取一些明智而谨慎的降息措施，经济衰退可能是可以避免的。”

The ECB likely ended its tightening cycle in October, keeping the deposit rate at a record high 4.00% after an unprecedented tightening cycle that began when the deposit rate was negative in July last year.翻译:欧洲央行可能会在 10 月份结束紧缩周期，继去年 7 月存款利率为负值后开始前所未有的紧缩周期后，将存款利率维持在 4.00% 的历史高位。

Money market traders are betting September's hike was the last, with almost 90 basis points of rate cuts priced by the end of 2024.翻译:货币市场交易员押注 9 月份的加息是最后一次，预计到 2024 年底降息近 90 个基点。

If the ECB meets those expectations, strategists see outperformance in riskier areas of the market.翻译:如果欧洲央行满足这些预期，策略师们就会看到市场风险较高领域的表现优于预期。

"Risk appetite will drive investors towards growth over the next six months, especially as central banks adopt a more dovish stance," said Thomas Monteiro, senior analyst at Investing.com.翻译:Investing.com 高级分析师托马斯·蒙泰罗 (Thomas Monteiro) 表示：“风险偏好将推动投资者在未来六个月内实现增长，特别是在央行采取更为鸽派立场的情况下。”

Germany's DAX (.GDAXI) was seen rising 5% by the end of next year, the survey found, having risen 14% so far in 2023.翻译:调查发现，德国 DAX (.GDAXI)预计到明年年底将上涨 5%，2023 年迄今已上涨 14%。

The survey found a similar scenario for Britain's FTSE 100 (.FTSE), which is expected to rise 6.7% by the end of 2024, after a broadly unchanged year to date.翻译:调查发现，英国富时 100 指数(.FTSE)也出现了类似情况，预计到 2024 年底，该指数将上涨 6.7%，而今年迄今基本没有变化。

"While inflation has cooled to a two-year low and the Bank of England appears to be at the end of its rate hiking cycle, concerns over a recession will likely act as a headwind over the coming months," said Fiona Cincotta, senior market analyst at City Index.翻译:资深市场人士 Fiona Cincotta 表示：“虽然通胀已降至两年低点，且英国央行似乎已结束加息周期，但对经济衰退的担忧可能会成为未来几个月的阻力。”城市指数分析师。

"With the prospect of a recession in the coming quarters, sentiment towards UK equities could be weak, particularly if the U.S. economy continues to fare comparatively better," Cincotta added.翻译:辛科塔补充道：“鉴于未来几个季度出现衰退的前景，英国股市的情绪可能会疲软，特别是如果美国经济继续表现相对较好的话。”

European shares underperforming their U.S. counterparts was a common expectation amongst the survey's European respondents as the robust American economy looks more likely to achieve a 'soft landing' than Europe.翻译:调查的欧洲受访者普遍预期欧洲股市表现逊于美国股市，因为强劲的美国经济看起来比欧洲更有可能实现“软着陆”。

European shares are much cheaper than those in the U.S., possibly reflecting the worse economic outlook.翻译:欧洲股票比美国股票便宜得多，这可能反映了更糟糕的经济前景。

The STOXX Europe 600 trades at over 12 times 12-month forward earnings, a 35.6% discount to the S&P 500 (.SPX). The current discount is just above a record gap of around 37% reached in July and more than twice the 20-year average discount of 16.3%.翻译:STOXX Europe 600 的 12 个月远期市盈率超过 12 倍，比标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)折价 35.6%。目前的折扣略高于 7 月份创下的 37% 左右的创纪录差距，是 20 年平均折扣 16.3% 的两倍多。

Investing.com's Monteiro said Europe's industrial and consumer slowdown looks more "broad-based" than the U.S. but still sees room for upside in European stocks in the near term.翻译:Investing.com的蒙泰罗表示，欧洲工业和消费放缓看起来比美国更为“广泛”，但欧洲股市短期内仍有上涨空间。

"It's likely that a year-end rally in the U.S. would also push European equities higher due to the sheer risk appetite in the world it would prompt," Monteiro said.翻译:蒙泰罗表示：“美国年底的反弹可能也会推动欧洲股市走高，因为这将引发全球风险偏好。”

"Still, as the broader economic slowdown takes hold of the continent's markets, we expect to see a rather challenging second half of 2024."翻译:“尽管如此，随着非洲大陆市场整体经济放缓，我们预计 2024 年下半年将充满挑战。”

Reporting by Samuel Indyk and Danilo Masoni; additional polling by Pranoy Krishna, Rahul Trivedi and Sarupya Ganguly in Bengaluru; editing by Jason Neely翻译:塞缪尔·因迪克和达尼洛·马索尼的报道； Pranoy Krishna、Rahul Trivedi 和 Sarupya Ganguly 在班加罗尔进行的额外民意调查；杰森·尼利编辑

item.title: 调查显示，不到 30% 的日本企业计划在中国扩张
item.description:
The number of Japanese firms planning to expand in China has fallen to less than 30% for the first time, according to a survey published on Tuesday, with economic slowdown, increasing competition and geopolitical tension putting many off.翻译:周二公布的一项调查显示，由于经济放缓、竞争加剧以及地缘政治紧张局势，计划在中国扩张的日本企业数量首次降至不到 30%。

The waning appetite for Japanese businesses to augment operations in Japan's biggest trade partner, alongside the United States, underscores fraught bilateral ties between the east Asian neighbours.翻译:日本企业对扩大在日本最大贸易伙伴以及美国的业务的兴趣减弱，突显了东亚邻国之间的双边关系令人担忧。

In an annual survey by the Japan External Trade Organisation, a semi-governmental export promotion agency, 27.7% of 710 companies said they were expecting to expand operations in China in the next a year or two.翻译:半政府出口促进机构日本贸易振兴机构的年度调查显示，710 家公司中有 27.7% 表示，他们预计在未来一两年内扩大在中国的业务。

The percentage declined from 33.4% last year and 40.9% in 2021.翻译:这一比例较去年的33.4% 和2021 年的 40.9% 有所下降。

Some 31 firms attributed their downsizing to economic uncertainty and a sluggish market, while 15 blamed a slump in Japanese auto sales in China, the world's top car market.翻译:约31家公司将裁员归咎于经济不确定性和市场低迷，而15家公司则将其归咎于日本汽车在全球最大汽车市场中国的销量下滑。

Japanese car makers, like other foreign brands, face the rise of domestic players in China, the popularity of electric vehicles and growing price competition.翻译:与其他外国品牌一样，日本汽车制造商面临着中国本土企业的崛起、电动汽车的普及以及日益激烈的价格竞争。

Seven firms also noted rising geopolitical risks, with bilateral relations, rarely smooth, have been particularly strained over recent months.翻译:七家公司还指出，地缘政治风险不断上升，双边关系很少顺利，近几个月来尤其紧张。

China last month arrested a Japanese executive, an employee of Japanese drugmaker Astellas Pharma (4503.T), on suspicion of espionage. The arrest has had a chilling effect on business, Japanese officials say.翻译:中国上个月以涉嫌间谍罪逮捕了一名日本制药商安斯泰来制药（Astellas Pharma，4503.T）的员工，一名日本高管。日本官员表示，这次逮捕对商业产生了寒蝉效应。

Japan infuriated China when it began releasing treated radioactive water from its wrecked Fukushima nuclear plant into the ocean in August, leading to a Chinese ban on Japanese seafood.翻译:八月，日本开始将失事福岛核电站处理过的放射性水排入海洋， 激怒了中国，导致中国对日本海鲜实施禁令。

Chinese President Xi Jinping and Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida last week said they would pursue mutually beneficial relations in their first face-to-face talks in a year.翻译:中国国家主席习近平和日本首相岸田文雄上周表示，他们将在一年来的首次面对面会谈中寻求互利关系。

Reporting by Satoshi Sugiyama; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:杉山聪的报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 菲律宾与美军展开联合海空巡逻
item.description:
Summary:
  • Patrols start in northernmost Philippine island near Taiwan
  • US, Philippines deploy combat, surveillance planes, navy ships
  • Manila beefs up U.S. ties this year as relations with China sour
翻译:概括：
  • 菲律宾最北端靠近台湾的岛屿开始巡逻
  • 美国和菲律宾部署战斗、侦察机和海军舰艇
  • 由于与中国的关系恶化，马尼拉今年加强了与美国的关系

The militaries of the Philippines and the United States launched joint patrols on Tuesday in waters near Taiwan, officials of the Southeast Asian nation said, a move likely to fan further tension with China.翻译:菲律宾官员表示，菲律宾和美国军队周二在台湾附近海域进行联合巡逻，此举可能会加剧与中国的紧张关系。

Security engagements between the treaty allies have soared this year, including a decision to almost double the number of Philippine bases the American military can access, some facing Taiwan, and their largest-ever joint military drill in April.翻译:今年，条约盟国之间的安全接触猛增，包括决定将美国军队可以进入的菲律宾基地数量几乎增加一倍，其中一些基地面向台湾，以及四月份举行的有史以来最大规模的联合军事演习。

This week's three-day joint air and maritime exercise was a "significant initiative" to boost interoperability between the two, Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. said.翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯表示，本周为期三天的联合空中和海上演习是促进两国之间互操作性的“重大举措”。

"I am confident this ... will contribute to a more secure and stable environment for our people," he said on social media platform X.翻译:他在社交媒体平台 X 上表示：“我相信这......将为我们的人民创造一个更安全、更稳定的环境。”

The drill would start off in Mavulis island, the Philippines' northernmost point, located about 100 km (62 miles) off Taiwan, said Eugene Cabusao, spokesperson for the Northern Luzon command.翻译:北吕宋司令部发言人尤金·卡布桑 (Eugene Cabusao) 表示，演习将从菲律宾最北端的马武利斯岛开始，该岛距离台湾约 100 公里（62 英里）。

It will end in the West Philippine Sea, the name Manila uses for waters in the South China Sea that fall within its exclusive economic zone (EEZ).翻译:它将终止于西菲律宾海，马尼拉用这个名称来称呼位于其专属经济区（EEZ）内的南中国海水域。

The Philippine military said three navy vessels, two FA-50 light combat aircraft and a A-29B Super Tucano light attack plane would participate, while the United States would send a littoral combat ship and a P8-A maritime patrol and reconnaissance aircraft.翻译:菲律宾军方表示，将派出三艘海军舰艇、两架FA-50轻型战斗机和一架A-29B超级巨嘴鸟轻型攻击机，美国将派出一艘濒海战斗舰和一架P8-A海上巡逻侦察机。

The news comes a day after Marcos told a forum in Hawaii the situation in the South China Sea had become more "dire", with the Chinese military inching closer to the Philippine coastline.翻译:这一消息发布的前一天，马科斯在夏威夷的一个论坛上表示，随着中国军队逐渐逼近菲律宾海岸线，南海局势变得更加“ 严峻”。

The patrols, which are likely to irk China, are a sign the Philippines is stepping up its defence posture amid what it described as China's "aggressive activities" in the highly strategic waters, long seen as a potential flashpoint between the United States and China.翻译:这些巡逻可能会激怒中国，这表明菲律宾正在加强防御态势，因为菲律宾称中国在这片具有高度战略意义的海域进行“侵略活动”，该海域长期以来被视为中美之间潜在的冲突点。

China's embassy in Manila did not immediately respond to a request for comment on the exercise.翻译:中国驻马尼拉大使馆没有立即回应对此次演习发表评论的请求。

China claims most of the South China Sea on the basis of a "nine-dash line" that stretches as far as 1,500 km (900 miles) south of its mainland, cutting into the EEZs of rival claimants Brunei, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines and Vietnam.翻译:中国以“九段线”为基础对南海大部分地区拥有主权，该线延伸至其大陆以南1,500公里（900英里），切入了其他声索国文莱、印度尼西亚、马来西亚和菲律宾的专属经济区和越南。

Marcos has forged closer ties with Washington since assuming office last year after a testy relationship with former President Rodrigo Duterte, who had pivoted closer to Beijing in exchange for infrastructure projects and investments.翻译:自去年上任以来，马科斯与华盛顿建立了更密切的关系，此前他与前总统罗德里戈·杜特尔特(Rodrigo Duterte)关系紧张，杜特尔特曾向北京靠拢，以换取基础设施项目和投资。

Ties with China have soured under Marcos, with repeated standoffs between Chinese and Filipino vessels in waters claimed by both countries, prompting heated exchanges of rhetoric and concerns of an escalation.翻译:在马科斯的领导下，中菲关系恶化，中国和菲律宾船只在两国均声称拥有主权的海域内多次发生对峙，引发激烈的口水战和对局势升级的担忧。

Marcos recently met Chinese President Xi Jinping in a bid to reduce the tension.翻译:马科斯最近会见了中国国家主席习近平，以缓和紧张局势。

The joint patrol with the United States showed the Manila was making a stand over the South China Sea, said Jay Batongbacal, director of the Institute for Maritime Affairs and Law of the Sea in Manila, the capital.翻译:首都马尼拉海洋事务与海洋法研究所所长杰伊·巴通巴卡尔表示，与美国的联合巡逻表明马尼拉号在南中国海问题上表明了立场。

"It shows that the Philippines is really firming up its posture on West Philippine Sea issues," Batongbacal said.翻译:巴通巴卡尔说：“这表明菲律宾确实在西菲律宾海问题上坚定了立场。”

Reporting by Mikhail Flores and Karen Lema; Editing by Martin Petty and Clarence Fernandez翻译:米哈伊尔·弗洛雷斯和凯伦·莱玛的报道；马丁·佩蒂和克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑

item.title: 中国警告阿根廷断绝关系将是“严重错误”
item.description:
China said on Tuesday it would be a "serious mistake" if Argentina were to cut ties, after the weekend presidential election victory in the South American country of a right-wing libertarian who has said he will not deal with communists.翻译:中国周二表示，在南美国家右翼自由主义者周末赢得总统选举后，如果阿根廷与共产党断绝关系，那将是一个“严重的错误”。

Argentinian president-elect Javier Milei has criticised China as well as Brazil, which are among his country's most important trading partners. A few months ago, Milei even likened the Chinese government to an "assassin" and said the people of China were "not free".翻译:阿根廷当选总统哈维尔·米莱批评了中国和巴西，两国都是阿根廷最重要的贸易伙伴。几个月前，米雷甚至将中国政府比作“刺客”，并称中国人民“不自由”。

Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning told a regular news briefing that the development of relations with Argentina had been showing good momentum, and it would be a "serious mistake" for Argentina to cut ties with countries such as China and Brazil.翻译:中国外交部发言人毛宁在例行记者会上表示，中阿关系发展呈现良好势头，阿根廷与中国、巴西等国断绝关系将是“严重错误”。

Milei's tough talk on China stands in sharp contrast with a vow of cooperation by the outgoing president, Alberto Fernandez, who visited Beijing last month and hailed China as a "true friend" of Argentina.翻译:米莱对中国的强硬言论与即将卸任的总统 阿尔贝托·费尔南德斯的合作誓言形成鲜明对比。费尔南德斯上个月访问北京，并称赞中国是阿根廷的“真正的朋友”。

Fernandez also pledged coordination with China under frameworks such as the G20 and BRICS.翻译:费尔南德斯还承诺在二十国集团和金砖国家等框架下与中国进行协调。

Diana Mondino, an economist tipped to become foreign minister in the Milei administration, said Argentina would not join the BRICS grouping, which includes China and Russia, Russia's RIA Novosti news agency cited her as saying.翻译:俄罗斯俄新社援引经济学家戴安娜·蒙迪诺的话说，阿根廷不会加入包括中国和俄罗斯在内的金砖国家。

Argentina was among six countries invited to become new members of BRICS, a bloc whose members also include Brazil, India and South Africa.翻译:阿根廷是受邀成为金砖国家新成员的六个国家之一，该集团的成员还包括巴西、印度和南非。

Mondino told RIA Novosti that Argentina would "stop interacting" with the governments of China and Brazil, when asked whether Argentina would encourage exports and imports with those countries.翻译:当被问及阿根廷是否会鼓励与中国和巴西的进出口时，蒙迪诺告诉俄新社，阿根廷将“停止与中国和巴西政府互动”。

Mao, asked by reporters about Mondino's remarks, said: "The two sides have strong economic complementarity and huge potential for cooperation.翻译:毛泽东在被记者问及蒙迪诺的言论时说：“双方经济互补性强，合作潜力巨大。

"China is willing to continue to work together with Argentina to promote the stability and long-term development of bilateral relations."翻译:中方愿继续与阿方共同努力，推动两国关系稳定和长远发展。

Earlier this month, Mondino said Argentina had no problem trading with Brazil, and as for China, Milei would seek to end opaque state-to-state deals.翻译:本月早些时候，蒙迪诺表示阿根廷与巴西的贸易没有问题，至于中国，米雷将寻求结束不透明的国与国之间的交易。

"What we are not going to do are secret contracts. Argentina, this government, in the last 20 years, has had multiple secret negotiations," she said. "That is not normal and it is what we have said we are not going to do."翻译:“我们不会做的是秘密合同。阿根廷政府在过去20年里进行了多次秘密谈判，”她说。 “这是不正常的，我们已经说过我们不会这样做。”

Chinese state media has so far downplayed the China comments of the "fiery" Milei, but warned that Argentina would be the one who could lose out if it were to shut China out of its market.翻译:到目前为止，中国官方媒体淡化了“火热”的米莱对中国的评论，但警告说，如果阿根廷将中国排除在市场之外，可能会遭受损失。

Reporting by Ethan Wang and Ryan Woo; Editing by Christopher Cushing, Edwina Gibbs and Alex Richardson翻译:Ethan Wang 和 Ryan Woo 的报道；编辑：克里斯托弗·库欣、埃德温娜·吉布斯和亚历克斯·理查森
item.author: Ryan Woo, Ethan Wang

item.title: Stellantis、宁德时代计划在欧洲建厂生产更便宜的电动汽车电池
item.description:
Stellantis (STLAM.MI) said on Tuesday it plans to build an electric vehicle battery plant with China's CATL (300750.SZ) in Europe, its fourth one in the region, as the European carmaker seeks to make cheaper batteries and more affordable EVs.翻译:Stellantis (STLAM.MI)周二表示，计划与中国宁德时代 (CATL ) (300750.SZ)在欧洲建立一家电动汽车电池工厂，这是其在该地区的第四家工厂，因为这家欧洲汽车制造商寻求生产更便宜的电池和更便宜的电动汽车。

The two companies announced a preliminary agreement for the supply of lithium iron phosphate (LFP) battery cells and modules for the automaker's EV production in Europe and said they were also considering setting up a 50-50 joint venture in the region.翻译:两家公司宣布达成初步协议，为该汽车制造商在欧洲的电动汽车生产供应磷酸铁锂 (LFP) 电池和模块，并表示他们还考虑在该地区建立一家 50:50 的合资企业。

Stellantis Global Head of Purchasing and Supply Chain Maxime Picat said the JV plan with CATL was aimed at building a new gigafactory in Europe to make LFP batteries. They are cheaper to produce but less powerful compared with nickel manganese cobalt (NMC) ones, the other current mainstream technology.翻译:Stellantis全球采购和供应链主管Maxime Picat表示，与宁德时代的合资计划旨在在欧洲建立一座新的超级工厂来生产磷酸铁锂电池。与目前另一种主流技术镍锰钴 (NMC) 技术相比，它们的生产成本更低，但威力较差。

Discussions were ongoing with CATL on the JV plan and a few more months were needed to finalise it, Picat said, declining to provide details about the possible location of the new battery facility.翻译:皮卡特表示，正在与宁德时代就合资计划进行讨论，还需要几个月的时间才能最终确定，但他拒绝提供有关新电池工厂可能位置的详细信息。

It would be CATL's latest investment in the region, as it expands outside its home market.翻译:这将是宁德时代在该地区的最新投资，因为该公司正在向本土市场以外的市场扩张。

Europe's carmakers and governments are pouring billions of euros into building battery plants on their home turf to reduce their dependency on Asia. At the same time, Chinese battery makers like CATL are building plants in Europe for European-made EVs.翻译:欧洲汽车制造商和政府正在投入数十亿欧元在本国建设电池厂，以减少对亚洲的依赖。与此同时，宁德时代等中国电池制造商正在欧洲建设欧洲制造的电动汽车工厂。

Picat said the deals with CATL would complement the group's electrification strategy, with LFP batteries helping cut production costs in Europe, while maintaining output of NMC batteries for more expensive cars.翻译:皮卡特表示，与宁德时代的交易将补充该集团的电气化战略，磷酸铁锂电池有助于降低欧洲的生产成本，同时维持用于更昂贵汽车的三元电池的产量。

"Definitely what we are aiming at is to grow those LFP batteries on multi-segment, because affordability is needed on many different segments, being passenger vehicle or potentially commercial vehicles," he said.翻译:他说：“我们的目标无疑是在多个细分市场上发展磷酸铁锂电池，因为许多不同的细分市场都需要负担能力，无论是乘用车还是潜在的商用车。”

In Europe, Stellantis -- the owner of brands including Jeep, Peugeot, Fiat and Alfa Romeo -- is building three gigafactories, in France, Germany and Italy through its ACC joint venture with Mercedes (MBGn.DE) and TotalEnergies (TTEF.PA), specialising on NMC chemistry.翻译:在欧洲，拥有吉普、标致、菲亚特和阿尔法罗密欧等品牌的 Stellantis 正在通过其与梅赛德斯(MBGn.DE)和 TotalEnergies (TTEF.PA) 成立的 ACC 合资企业，在法国、德国和意大利建设三个超级工厂。 ） ，专门研究 NMC 化学。

"Affordability is a key and that's where LFP is today the best technology you can find on the market in that compromise between autonomy and cost," Picat added. "That's where we bring that second very important stage to our strategy in Europe".翻译:皮卡特补充道：“价格实惠是关键，这就是 LFP 成为当今市场上在自主性和成本之间取得平衡的最佳技术的原因。” “这就是我们欧洲战略的第二个非常重要的阶段”。

CATL Chairman and General Manager Robin Zeng said the partnership "will be a decisive step on both parties' journey towards carbon neutrality goals".翻译:CATL董事长兼总经理曾罗宾表示，此次合作“将是双方迈向碳中和目标的决定性一步”。

Under Tuesday's agreement, CATL will also initially supply LFP batteries to the Franco-Italian automaker for EVs in its passenger car, crossover and small and medium sized SUV segments.翻译:根据周二的协议，宁德时代还将首先向这家法国-意大利汽车制造商供应磷酸铁锂电池，用于其乘用车、跨界车和中小型SUV细分市场的电动汽车。

Since its creation in early 2021 through the merger of Fiat Chrysler and Peugeot maker PSA, it has lined up several supply agreements for materials needed for its global EV production.翻译:自 2021 年初通过菲亚特克莱斯勒和标致制造商 PSA 合并成立以来，该公司已就其全球电动汽车生产所需的材料达成了多项供应协议。

Reporting by Giulio Piovaccari; Editing by Josephine Mason and Keith Weir翻译:朱利奥·皮奥瓦卡里报道；约瑟芬·梅森和基思·威尔编辑
item.author: Giulio Piovaccari

item.title: 美联储会议纪要前欧洲股市接近 5-1/2 周高点，美元承压
item.description:
European shares were holding near a 5-1/2 week high on Tuesday while the dollar languished near its lowest in two-and-a-half months on expectations the U.S. Federal Reserve is likely done with interest rate hikes.翻译:欧洲股市周二维持在 5-1/2 周高点附近，而美元则因预期美联储可能结束加息而徘徊在两个半月以来的最低水平附近。

The pan-European STOXX 600 (.STOXX) index was little changed on the day at 455.98 points. The index is up over 5% this month and on track for its biggest monthly gain since January.翻译:泛欧斯托克 600 指数(.STOXX)当天变化不大，报 455.98 点。该指数本月上涨超过 5%，有望创下自 1 月份以来的最大月度涨幅。

Germany's DAX (.GDAXI) was eking out a 0.15% gain, while France's CAC 40 (.FCHI) and Britain's FTSE 100 (.FTSE) were a touch softer.翻译:德国DAX指数(.GDAXI)勉强上涨0.15%，而法国CAC 40指数(.FCHI)和英国富时100指数(.FTSE)则略显疲软。

With the economic calendar bare in Europe, Wall Street futures , , were trading lower before the minutes of the Federal Reserve's last meeting, which investors will use to gauge which way rates are headed, and also on earnings from Nvidia (NVDA.O), which hit a record high on Monday.翻译:由于欧洲经济日历清淡，华尔街期货在美联储上次会议纪要之前走低，投资者将利用该会议纪要来判断利率走势以及英伟达(NVDA.O)的收益，周一创下历史新高。

On Monday, Wall Street's three major stock averages rose, with Nasdaq's 1% rally leading the charge as heavyweight Microsoft (MSFT.O) hit a record high after it hired Sam Altman, who headed OpenAI until he was ousted late last week.翻译:周一，华尔街三大股指均上涨，其中纳斯达克指数上涨 1%，重量级微软(MSFT.O)在聘请了山姆·奥尔特曼 (Sam Altman) 后创下历史新高。

Stock markets have broadly rebounded in November as a flurry of data that showed U.S. inflation might be easing has spurred bets that the Fed is done with monetary tightening and rate cuts may be on the way next year.翻译:11 月份股市普遍反弹，一系列数据显示美国通胀可能正在放缓，这引发了人们对美联储结束货币紧缩政策、明年可能会降息的押注。

Traders have nearly fully priced in the likelihood that the Fed will keep interest rates unchanged in December, and some have started pricing in rate cuts as soon as March, according to the CME Group's FedWatch tool.翻译:根据芝商所集团的 FedWatch 工具，交易员几乎已经完全消化了美联储将在 12 月维持利率不变的可能性，一些交易员最早已经开始在 3 月份降息。

"The rapid drop in inflation, both in the U.S. and Europe, has been incredibly positive and quite substantial," said Hani Redha, portfolio manager, global multi-asset at PineBridge Investments.翻译:PineBridge Investments 全球多元资产投资组合经理哈尼·雷德哈 (Hani Redha) 表示：“美国和欧洲的通胀率迅速下降，这是令人难以置信的积极影响，而且幅度相当大。”

"Inflation relief and then loosening of financial conditions has provided relief for risk assets."翻译:“通胀缓解以及随后金融状况的放松缓解了风险资产的压力。”

Trading is expected to be muted for much of the week, ahead of Thursday's U.S. Thanksgiving holiday and a sparse data calendar for the week.翻译:在周四美国感恩节假期之前以及本周数据稀少的情况下，本周大部分时间交易预计将保持平静。

In Asia, MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) was 0.6% higher having earlier touched 511.05, the highest since Sept. 5. Japan's Nikkei (.N225) closed lower but remained close to the 33-year high it touched on Monday. The index is up roughly 28% this year, making it the best performing stock market in Asia.翻译:在亚洲，摩根士丹利资本国际 (MSCI) 日本以外最广泛的亚太股市指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)上涨 0.6%，早些时候触及 511.05，为 9 月 5 日以来的最高水平。日本日经指数(.N225)收盘走低，但仍接近 33 年高点周一触及。该指数今年上涨了约 28%，成为亚洲表现最好的股市。

The MSCI World Equity Index (.MIWD00000PUS) gained 0.1%.翻译:MSCI 世界股票指数(.MIWD00000PUS)上涨 0.1%。

Treasury yields were lower in the wake of solid bidding in the $16-billion sale of 20-year Treasury bonds on Monday that suggested the market still anticipates inflation will decelerate and the Fed will cut rates next year.翻译:周一 160 亿美元的 20 年期国债发售后，国债收益率走低，这表明市场仍预计通胀将放缓，美联储明年将降息。

The yield on 10-year Treasury notes was down 1 basis point to 4.41%, while the yield on the 30-year Treasury bond was down 3 basis points to 4.547%.翻译:10年期国债收益率下跌1个基点至4.41%，30年期国债收益率下跌3个基点至4.547%。

Lower yields kept the dollar on the back foot, with the dollar index , which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of six major currencies, down 0.1% at 103.30, having touched near three-month low of 103.17 earlier in the session.翻译:收益率下降使美元处于不利地位，衡量美元兑一篮子六种主要货币的美元指数下跌0.1%至103.30，盘中早些时候曾触及近三个月低点103.17。

The Japanese yen strengthened to 147.155 per dollar, lifting further away from the one-year low of 151.92 it touched last week.翻译:日元兑美元汇率升至147.155，进一步远离上周触及的一年低点151.92。

China's yuan rose to its highest since July in both the offshore and onshore markets, gaining from a much stronger midpoint fixing.翻译:人民币在离岸和在岸市场均升至 7 月份以来的最高水平，受益于中间价大幅走强。

"A softer dollar environment has seen Chinese authorities turn the screws on those with short renminbi positions," ING strategist Chris Turner said.翻译:荷兰国际集团(ING)策略师克里斯·特纳(Chris Turner)表示，“美元走软的环境导致中国当局对那些做空人民币头寸的人进行了严厉打击。”

"For the short term, we think these moves can lift the Asian FX bloc in general and add to the current soft dollar environment."翻译:“从短期来看，我们认为这些举措可以整体提振亚洲外汇集团，并加剧当前疲软的美元环境。”

The Australian dollar , often seen as a barometer of risk appetite, touched a more than three-month high of $0.6587 earlier in the session.翻译:通常被视为风险偏好晴雨表的澳元在盘中早些时候触及三个多月高点0.6587美元。

The head of Australia's central bank said on Tuesday inflation will remain a crucial challenge over the next one to two years, in comments made two weeks after policymakers raised interest rates to a 12-year high earlier to tame high prices.翻译:澳大利亚央行行长周二表示，通胀仍将是未来一到两年的一个关键挑战，两周前政策制定者将利率提高至 12 年高点以抑制高物价。

Oil prices eased, reversing the previous day's rally. U.S. crude eased 1% to $77.03 per barrel and Brent was at $81.54, down a similar amount.翻译:油价回落，扭转了前一天的涨势。美国原油价格下跌 1%，至每桶 77.03 美元，布伦特原油价格跌至每桶 81.54 美元，跌幅类似。

Spot gold rose to $1977.60 per ounce, its highest level in more than two weeks, aided by the weaker dollar.翻译:受美元疲软的提振，现货金升至每盎司1977.60美元，为两周多来的最高水平。

Reporting by Ankur Banerjee; Editing by Lincoln Feast and Bernadette Baum翻译:安库尔·班纳吉报道；林肯·法斯特和伯纳黛特·鲍姆编辑
item.author: Samuel Indyk, Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 独家：法国和美国将在 COP28 上提议禁止向燃煤电厂提供私人融资
item.description:
France, backed by the United States, plans to seek a halt to private financing for coal-based power plants during the U.N. climate conference later this month, three sources familiar with the deliberations told Reuters in India and Europe.翻译:印度和欧洲的三名知情人士告诉路透，在美国的支持下，法国计划在本月晚些时候的联合国气候会议期间寻求停止对燃煤电厂的私人融资。

The plan, which was communicated to India earlier this month, will deepen divisions at the COP28 summit in Dubai running from Nov. 30 to Dec. 12, with India and China opposed to any attempt to block construction of coal-fired power stations for their energy-hungry economies.翻译:该计划于本月早些时候传达给印度，将加深 11 月 30 日至 12 月 12 日在迪拜举行的 COP28 峰会上的分歧，印度和中国反对任何阻止本国燃煤发电站建设的企图。能源匮乏的经济体。

France's minister of state for development Chrysoula Zacharopoulou told the Indian government about the plan, called the "New Coal Exclusion Policy", for private financial institutions and insurance companies, two Indian officials said.翻译:两名印度官员称，法国发展国务部长 Chrysoula Zacharopoulou 向印度政府介绍了针对私人金融机构和保险公司的“新煤炭排除政策”计划。

The plan to stop private financing for coal-fired power plants has not been previously reported.翻译:此前并未报道过停止私人融资燃煤电厂的计划。

A spokesman for Zacharopoulou did not directly comment on emailed queries from Reuters but said the question of financial investments in coal had been discussed at several different multilateral forums over the past few years.翻译:扎查罗普卢的发言人没有直接对路透社通过电子邮件发出的询问发表评论，但表示过去几年在多个不同的多边论坛上讨论了煤炭金融投资问题。

India's environment, power and renewable energy, coal, external affairs and information ministries, the OECD and the French embassy in New Delhi did not respond to Reuters' requests for comment.翻译:印度环境、电力和可再生能源、煤炭、外交部和信息部、经合组织和法国驻新德里大使馆没有回应路透社的置评请求。

A source in Europe familiar with the plan said the aim was to dry up private funding for coal power and that it was a top priority for French President Emmanuel Macron during COP28, seen as a crucial opportunity to accelerate action to limit global warming.翻译:一位熟悉该计划的欧洲消息人士表示，该计划的目的是减少对煤电的私人融资，这是法国总统马克龙在 COP28 期间的首要任务，被视为加快采取行动限制全球变暖的重要机会。

The proposal provides for the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) to set coal-exit standards for private finance firms whose financing could be tracked by regulators, rating agencies and non-governmental organisations, the two Indian officials said.翻译:两位印度官员表示，该提案规定经济合作与发展组织（OECD）为私人金融公司制定煤炭退出标准，监管机构、评级机构和非政府组织可以跟踪这些公司的融资情况。

The U.S., European Union and Canada, among others, have been seeking a plan to expedite the phase-out of coal, which they have cited as the "number one threat" to climate goals.翻译:美国、欧盟和加拿大等国一直在寻求一项加速淘汰煤炭的计划，他们称煤炭是气候目标的“头号威胁”。

They are concerned private international financing continues to support large additions to coal capacity in developing nations, according to the plan shared by France with India.翻译:他们担心，根据法国与印度共享的计划，国际私人融资继续支持发展中国家大量增加煤炭产能。

Some 490 gigawatts of new coal capacity, roughly equal to one-fifth of existing global capacity, is planned or under construction, mostly in India and China, the officials said.翻译:官员们表示，计划或在建的新增煤炭产能约为 490 吉瓦，大约相当于全球现有产能的五分之一，其中大部分位于印度和中国。

Rick Duke, Deputy U.S. Special Envoy on Climate Change, did not comment directly on the proposal but noted the expansion in coal-fired plants.翻译:美国气候变化副特使里克·杜克没有直接评论该提案，但指出了燃煤电厂的扩张。

"We are pushing to set an expectation globally that countries need to join us in the fastest possible power sector transition, including all that clean power deployment," Duke said.翻译:杜克说：“我们正在努力在全球范围内树立一种期望，即各国需要与我们一起以最快的速度实现电力行业转型，包括所有清洁能源的部署。”

"And countries need to stop digging a deeper hole by building new unabated coal power plants, because unfortunately, there's still some 500 gigawatts of new coal-fired power plants in the pipeline globally, and the IPCC and the International Energy Agency have both been quite clear that that needed to stop already."翻译:“各国需要停止通过建设新的、未曾减少的燃煤发电厂来挖更深的坑，因为不幸的是，全球仍有约 500 吉瓦的新燃煤发电厂正在筹建中，而 IPCC 和国际能源署都已经相当显然，这种情况需要立即停止。”

Member countries are divided on emissions abatement technologies that are yet to evolve to commercial scale for use in developing countries, one of the Indian officials said.翻译:一位印度官员表示，成员国在减排技术方面存在分歧，这些技术尚未发展到在发展中国家使用的商业规模。

About 73% of electricity consumed in India is produced using coal, even though the country has increased its non-fossil capacity to 44% of its total installed power generation capacity.翻译:印度约 73% 的电力消耗是用煤炭生产的，尽管该国已将非化石能源发电量增加到总装机容量的 44%。

The country intends to resist the push to fix a deadline for a fossil fuel phase-out or phase-down at COP28, as coal will be its main energy source for a few more decades, and may ask members to shift their focus on reducing emissions from other sources. It may also push developed nations to become carbon negative rather than carbon neutral by 2050.翻译:该国打算抵制在 COP28 上确定逐步淘汰或逐步减少化石燃料最后期限的推动，因为煤炭将在未来几十年内成为其主要能源，并可能要求成员国将重点转移到减少排放上来自其他来源。它还可能推动发达国家到 2050 年实现碳负排放而不是碳中和。

item.title: 由于交易员关注利率调整，日元上涨，美元下跌
item.description:
The yen rallied against the dollar for a fourth straight session on Tuesday as investors positioned for the possibility that the Bank of Japan will tighten monetary policy next year while the Federal Reserve loosens.翻译:周二，日元兑美元连续第四个交易日上涨，因投资者预计日本央行明年将收紧货币政策，而美联储将放松货币政策。

The dollar hit its lowest level since mid-September at 147.16 yen and was last down 0.61% at 147.45.翻译:美元兑日元触及9月中旬以来最低水平147.16，最新跌幅0.61%至147.45。

More broadly, the dollar index , a gauge of the greenback against six other currencies, fell to its lowest since late August at 103.17 and was last 0.13% weaker at 103.32.翻译:更广泛地说，衡量美元兑其他六种货币的美元指数跌至8月底以来的最低点103.17，最后下跌0.13%至103.32。

"There has been a lot of excitement, momentum is building, about the ability of the Bank of Japan to exit its ultra-loose monetary policy... possibly next year, ending negative interest rates," said Jane Foley, head of FX strategy at Rabobank.翻译:外汇策略主管 Jane Foley 表示：“人们对日本央行退出超宽松货币政策的能力感到非常兴奋，势头正在增强……可能在明年结束负利率。”在荷兰合作银行。

Foley said a sharp drop in the dollar was also encouraging investors to unwind some of their bets against the yen. "The dollar is weaker, and this I think is just the catalyst for the market making bets on how far dollar-yen can really move," she said.翻译:弗利表示，美元大幅下跌也鼓励投资者解除部分做空日元的押注。她表示：“美元走弱，我认为这只是市场押注美元兑日元走势的催化剂。”

U.S. yields have tumbled as investors have wagered that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates next year, after a slowdown in U.S. inflation in October.翻译:十月份美国通胀放缓后，投资者押注美联储明年将降息， 美国收益率大幅下跌。

That has dragged the dollar index down from an almost one-year high at the start of October, when U.S. economic data was consistently beating expectations.翻译:这拖累美元指数从十月初的近一年高位回落，当时美国经济数据持续好于预期。

The 10-year U.S. Treasury yield fell for a fourth session running on Tuesday to 4.39%, after falling on Monday in the wake of a solid auction of 20-year bonds. It hit a 16-year high above 5% in October.翻译:10 年期美国国债收益率继周一因 20 年期债券拍卖强劲而下跌后，周二连续第四个交易日下跌至 4.39%。 10 月份触及 5% 以上，创 16 年新高。

The euro rose to its highest since mid-August at $1.0966 on Tuesday and was last very slightly higher at $1.0944.翻译:周二，欧元升至 8 月中旬以来的最高点 1.0966 美元，最后小幅上涨至 1.0944 美元。

Sterling was up 0.2% at $1.253, after hitting a two-month high of $1.254. Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey on Monday said it's "far too early to be thinking about rate cuts" in Britain.翻译:英镑上涨0.2%至1.253美元，此前触及两个月高点1.254美元。英国央行行长安德鲁·贝利周一表示，英国“考虑降息还为时过早”。

Also weighing on the U.S. currency was a rally in China's yuan , which hit an almost four-month high of 7.13 per dollar.翻译:人民币升值也对美元构成压力，人民币兑美元触及近四个月高点7.13。

China's central bank set the midpoint of the yuan's trading band at its strongest since Aug. 7. The firm currency fixing came together with a Bloomberg News report on forthcoming support for the property sector which boosted stocks, said National Australia Bank strategist Rodrigo Catril in Sydney.翻译:中国央行将人民币交易区间的中点设定为8月7日以来的最高水平。澳大利亚国民银行策略师罗德里戈·卡特里尔(Rodrigo Catril)在悉尼表示，人民币汇率的坚定定位与彭博新闻社关于即将支持房地产行业的报道一起提振了股市。

Elisabet Kopelman, U.S. economist at lender SEB, said: "Strong risk appetite and speculation about future interest rate cuts are not a good environment for the dollar, which has come under pressure against a number of Asian currencies this morning."翻译:SEB美国经济学家Elisabet Kopelman表示：“强劲的风险偏好和对未来降息的猜测对美元来说并不是一个好的环境，美元今天上午兑多种亚洲货币面临压力。”

Minutes from the Fed's last meeting are due at 1900 GMT and headline the day ahead, along with a speech from European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde.翻译:美联储上次会议纪要将于格林威治标准时间 1900 点公布，并于未来一天发布，欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德 (Christine Lagarde) 也将发表讲话。

Some analysts caution that the dollar's downward momentum may not have too much further to run. "There is a risk that we are going to get push-back about the pace of Fed easing," said Foley.翻译:一些分析师警告称，美元的下行势头可能不会持续太久。弗利表示：“我们存在美联储宽松步伐受到阻碍的风险。”

Reporting by Harry Robertson in London and Tom Westbrook in Singapore; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Susan Fenton翻译:哈里·罗伯逊 (Harry Robertson) 在伦敦和汤姆·威斯布鲁克 (Tom Westbrook) 在新加坡的报道；编辑：杰奎琳·黄和苏珊·芬顿

item.title: 领跑者称台湾选举是民主还是中国的选择
item.description:
Taiwan's people have to choose in next year's election whether the island keeps moving forward on a road to democracy or "walks into the embrace of China", the frontrunner to be the next president said on Tuesday.翻译:下任总统的领跑者周二表示，台湾人民必须在明年的选举中做出选择，是继续走民主之路，还是“走进中国的怀抱”。

The issue of China, which claims Taiwan as its own territory, looms large ahead of the Jan. 13 presidential and parliamentary elections, especially as Beijing has been stepping up its military pressure on the island.翻译:在1月13日的总统和议会选举之前，中国声称台湾是其领土，这一问题显得尤为突出，特别是在北京方面一直在加大对台湾的军事压力的情况下。

Lai Ching-te, vice president and the ruling Democratic Progressive Party's (DPP) presidential candidate, has led in most opinion polls ahead of the election. The DPP champions Taiwan's separate identity from China.翻译:副总统、执政的民进党总统候选人赖清德在选举前的大多数民意调查中都处于领先地位。民进党主张台湾与中国的独立身份。

The largest opposition party, the Kuomintang (KMT), which traditionally favours close ties with Beijing, is locked in a dispute with the smaller Taiwan People's Party (TPP) about which of their candidates should run as president and which as vice president after agreeing to work together.翻译:最大的反对党国民党传统上倾向于与北京保持密切关系，现在与规模较小的台湾人民党陷入了争论，双方的候选人在同意后谁应该竞选总统，谁应该竞选副总统。一起工作。

Lai, speaking to reporters and supporters after formally registering his candidacy with the election commission, said Taiwan's security was an international issue and the world was watching the election.翻译:黎智英在向选举委员会正式登记参选后对记者和支持者表示，台湾的安全是一个国际问题，全世界都在关注选举。

"The people of Taiwan have to choose between trusting Taiwan, allowing Taiwan to continue to move forward on the road of democracy, and relying on China, following the old path of the one-China principle, and walking into the embrace of China," he said.翻译:“台湾人民必须做出选择，要么信任台湾，让台湾继续在民主道路上前进，要么依赖中国，走一中原则的老路，走进中国的怀抱。”他说。

Beijing has demanded that Taipei accepts that both sides of the Taiwan Strait belong to "one China", which the DPP-led government has rejected saying only the island's people can decide their future.翻译:北京要求台北接受台湾海峡两岸都属于“一个中国”，但民进党领导的政府拒绝了这一要求，称只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来。

Lai on Monday announced Taiwan's high-profile former de facto ambassador the United States, Hsiao Bi-khim, as his running mate.翻译:赖智周一宣布，备受瞩目的台湾前驻美大使萧美琴为竞选搭档。

Like Lai, Hsiao is vilified by China, which has twice placed sanctions on her, most recently in April, saying she was an "independence diehard".翻译:和黎智英一样，萧也受到中国的诽谤，中国已两次对她实施制裁，最近一次是在四月，称她是“独立顽固分子”。

Late on Monday, Chinese state television lambasted the Lai-Hsiao team in a commentary, saying they were "colluding villains".翻译:周一晚间，中国国家电视台在评论中痛斥丽萧团队，称他们是“恶棍勾结”。

"Taiwan independence means war. The Lai-Hsiao independence double act will intensify cross-strait tensions and conflict," the broadcaster said in the commentary posted on its website.翻译:该电视台在其网站上发表的评论中表示，“台独意味着战争。‘赖萧独’双重行为将加剧两岸紧张和冲突。”

Lai has dismissed China's criticism, saying on Monday it was further proof of its efforts to interfere in the election.翻译:黎智英驳斥了中国的批评，周一表示，这进一步证明了中国试图干预选举。

Lai, standing next to Hsiao outside the election commission, said he was full of confidence.翻译:黎智英站在选举委员会外的萧身边，他表示自己充满信心。

"We both deeply love this land, passionately love this country," he added.翻译:“我们都深深热爱这片土地，热爱这个国家，”他补充道。

The election registration deadline is Friday. It is not clear when the opposition parties will register their candidates.翻译:选举登记截止日期是周五。目前尚不清楚反对党何时登记候选人。

The KMT's presidential candidate, Hou Yu-ih, said he had spoken with the TPP's presidential candidate and party chairman Ko Wen-je on Tuesday and expressed his "sincerity" in wanting to keep talking about how they should team up.翻译:国民党总统候选人侯裕义表示，他已于周二与TPP总统候选人兼党主席柯文哲进行了交谈，并表达了他希望继续讨论他们应如何合作的“诚意”。

"From start to finish I have never insisted I had to be the lead," Hou said, referring to being the presidential rather than vice presidential candidate.翻译:侯说：“从始至终，我从未坚持要求我必须成为领先者。”他指的是总统候选人而不是副总统候选人。

Ko, a former Taipei mayor who founded the TPP in 2019, said on Sunday he would "continue to fight to the end as the TPP's presidential candidate".翻译:2019年创立TPP的前台北市长柯周日表示，他将“作为TPP的总统候选人继续战斗到底”。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Lincoln Feast, Robert Birsel翻译:本·布兰查德报道；林肯·盛宴、罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 穆斯林国家集团推动加沙停火——土耳其消息人士
item.description:
A newly formed group made up of senior officials from several Muslim countries will visit the United Nations Security Council's five permanent members and others to urge an immediate ceasefire in Gaza, a Turkish foreign ministry source said on Tuesday.翻译:土耳其外交部消息人士周二表示，由几个穆斯林国家高级官员组成的新成立小组将访问联合国安理会五个常任理事国和其他成员国，敦促加沙立即停火。

The group was formed earlier this month at a summit of the Arab League and Organisation of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) in Riyadh. It includes foreign ministers and representatives from Turkey, Qatar, Egypt, Jordan, Nigeria, Saudi Arabia, Indonesia, the Palestinian Authority, as well as the OIC Secretary General.翻译:该组织是本月早些时候在利雅得举行的阿拉伯联盟和伊斯兰合作组织（OIC）峰会上成立的。它包括来自土耳其、卡塔尔、埃及、约旦、尼日利亚、沙特阿拉伯、印度尼西亚、巴勒斯坦权力机构的外交部长和代表以及伊斯兰会议组织秘书长。

The source said the group had started talking with the permanent U.N. Security Council members - the United States, China, Russia, Britain, and France - with a visit to Beijing on Monday, and would also visit other countries.翻译:消息人士称，该组织已开始与联合国安理会常任理事国——美国、中国、俄罗斯、英国和法国进行谈判，并于周一访问北京，还将访问其他国家。

"The primary goal of the contact group is for a ceasefire to be announced as soon as possible and for humanitarian aid to be sent to Gaza," the source said.翻译:消息人士称：“联络小组的首要目标是尽快宣布停火并向加沙运送人道主义援助。”

"As an end goal, (the group) aims to contribute to the two-state solution within the framework of internationally accepted parameters; to Palestinians living in their own country safely, with stability and prosperity," the person said.翻译:这位人士说：“作为最终目标，（该组织）旨在在国际公认的参数框架内为两国解决方案做出贡献；让巴勒斯坦人在自己的国家安全、稳定和繁荣地生活。”

The Palestinian militant group Hamas' Oct. 7 raid, the deadliest in Israel's 75-year history, prompted Israel to invade Gaza. The military campaign has killed at least 13,000 Palestinians, many of them children and women, and led to calls for a ceasefire or humanitarian truce.翻译:巴勒斯坦激进组织哈马斯 10 月 7 日发动的袭击是以色列 75 年历史上最严重的一次袭击，促使以色列入侵加沙。军事行动已造成至少 13,000 名巴勒斯坦人死亡，其中许多是儿童和妇女，并引发了停火或人道主义休战的呼声。

Turkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan did not participate in the Beijing leg of the tour and will also miss the group's trip to Moscow on Tuesday as President Tayyip Erdogan is on a visit to Algeria, the source said.翻译:消息人士称，土耳其外交部长哈坎·菲丹没有参加北京站的行程，也将缺席周二的莫斯科之行，因为总统塔伊普·埃尔多安正在访问阿尔及利亚。

Fidan said on Monday he would join the next legs of the tour. He told Al Jazeera at the weekend that Muslim countries had, for now, decided to use "all diplomatic and humanitarian means" available to end the fighting in Gaza, adding Israeli attacks on the enclave must be stopped at the U.N. and other platforms with the efforts of likeminded countries.翻译:菲丹周一表示，他将参加接下来的巡回赛。他周末告诉半岛电视台，穆斯林国家目前决定使用“一切可用的外交和人道主义手段”来结束加沙的战斗，并补充说，以色列对飞地的袭击必须在联合国和其他平台上制止。志同道合国家的努力。

The group will meet British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and French President Emmanuel Macron during visits to Britain and France on Wednesday, the source said.翻译:消息人士称，该小组将于周三访问英国和法国期间会见英国首相苏纳克和法国总统马克龙。

Turkish media reported the group would visit France and Britain on Wednesday.翻译:土耳其媒体报道称，该小组将于周三访问法国和英国。

Separately, a group of 87 Turks, Turkish Cypriots, and their relatives arrived in Egypt from Gaza on Monday, and are expected to fly to Istanbul late on Tuesday, the source said.翻译:另外，消息人士称，由 87​​ 名土耳其人、土族塞人及其亲属组成的团体于周一从加沙抵达埃及，预计将于周二晚些时候飞往伊斯坦布尔。

On Monday, nearly 200 evacuees from Gaza, including patients in need of medical care and their companions, arrived in Turkey.翻译:周一， 近200名加沙撤离人员抵达土耳其，其中包括需要医疗护理的患者及其同伴。

item.title: 上海犹太难民历史成为新清唱剧的中心舞台
item.description:
Four years after it was first conceived, the oratorio Emigre made its debut this month in Shanghai, paying tribute to the Chinese financial hub's war-time role in protecting European Jewish refugees who fled to the city in the late 1930s.翻译:清唱剧《流亡者》首次构思四年后，于本月在上海首演，向中国金融中心在战时保护 1930 年代末逃往该市的欧洲犹太难民方面所发挥的作用致敬。

A collaboration between the Shanghai Symphony Orchestra, New York Philharmonic as well as choirs from the U.S. and China, the work premiered on Nov. 17.翻译:该作品由上海交响乐团、纽约爱乐乐团以及中美合唱团合作，于11月17日首演。

Composer Aaron Zigman, known best for his movie scores, said he was approached by Shanghai Symphony Orchestra's maestro Long Yu in 2019 with the idea for a piece telling the story of Shanghai's Jewish refugee history.翻译:以电影配乐而闻名的作曲家亚伦·齐格曼表示，2019 年，上海交响乐团指挥大师余隆找到他，提出创作一部讲述上海犹太难民历史故事的作品的想法。

"This is a story about two German Jewish brothers who had to flee Nazi Germany, and they came to Shanghai, which at that time opened its doors to many Jews," Zigman said.翻译:“这是一个关于两个德国犹太兄弟不得不逃离纳粹德国，来到上海的故事，当时上海向许多犹太人敞开了大门，”齐格曼说。

"It's really a multicultural love story at the end of the day, and then a story of humanity, love, hope and acceptance through the tragedy of loss as well."翻译:“归根结底，这确实是一个多元文化的爱情故事，也是一个在失去亲人的悲剧中讲述人性、爱、希望和接受的故事。”

In the late 1930s, as World War Two was about to break out, Shanghai was one of the few places in the world open to Jewish refugees, as many countries restricted visa access. As an "open port" a visa wasn't required for those arriving in Shanghai, mainly by boat, from Europe.翻译:20世纪30年代末，第二次世界大战即将爆发，上海是世界上少数向犹太难民开放的地方之一，因为许多国家限制签证。作为一个“开放港口”，那些主要从欧洲乘船抵达上海的人不需要签证。

An estimated 20,000 European Jews would escape to Shanghai throughout this period, though their new home was not without strife. China was also at war, with Japan, and Shanghai was occupied by Japanese forces from 1937.翻译:在此期间，估计有 20,000 名欧洲犹太人逃往上海，尽管他们的新家并非没有发生冲突。中国也与日本交战，上海从 1937 年起被日本军队占领。

Mark Campbell, the Pulitzer Prize-winning librettist behind the lyrics for Emigre said he felt the story was "special and important" to tell now, in view of the conflict between Israel and Hamas in Gaza, as well as the war in Ukraine.翻译:普利策奖得主、《移民》歌词作者马克·坎贝尔表示，考虑到以色列和哈马斯在加沙的冲突以及乌克兰的战争，他觉得现在讲述这个故事“特别且重要”。

"I believe that the message of accepting refugees, of accepting people and welcoming them, is resonating even more now," he added.翻译:他补充说：“我相信，接受难民、接受人们并欢迎他们的信息现在更能引起共鸣。”

Chen Jian, curator of the Shanghai Jewish Refugees Museum, was in the audience for Emigre's global premiere at the Jaguar Shanghai Symphony Orchestra Hall in downtown Shanghai.翻译:上海犹太难民博物馆馆长陈健在上海市中心的捷豹上海交响乐团音乐厅观看了《移民》全球首演。

"I think this kind of creation is very meaningful and valuable," he told Reuters before the performance. "In mankind's darkest times, we need kind hearts and good deeds. This story should have an educational effect on how we look at disputes in the world today."翻译:“我认为这种创作非常有意义和有价值，”他在演出前告诉路透社。 “在人类最黑暗的时期，我们需要善良的心和善行。这个故事应该对我们如何看待当今世界的争端产生教育作用。”

The work, sung in English with Chinese supertitles, ran in Shanghai through Nov. 20. It is scheduled to be performed in New York early next year.翻译:这部作品以英文演唱，配有中文字幕，于 11 月 20 日在上海演出。预计明年初在纽约演出。

item.title: 缅甸向中国移交数千名电信诈骗嫌疑人
item.description:
Myanmar authorities have handed over 31,000 telecom fraud suspects to China since law enforcement officers from both countries launched a crackdown on online scams in September, Chinese authorities said on Tuesday.翻译:中国当局周二表示，自两国执法人员9月发起打击网络诈骗以来，缅甸当局已将31,000名电信诈骗嫌疑人移交给中国。

The suspects included 63 "financiers" and ring-leaders of crime syndicates that have cheated Chinese citizens of large sums of money, the Ministry of Public Security said in a statement.翻译:公安部在一份声明中称，犯罪嫌疑人包括63名“金融家”和犯罪集团头目，他们诈骗中国公民巨额资金。

"The crackdown has achieved significant battle results," the ministry said.翻译:公安部表示，此次打击行动取得了显著成效。

More than 100,000 people engage in telecom fraud each day in at least 1,000 scam centres in Myanmar, which shares a border with southwest China, Chinese state media has reported.翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，与中国西南部接壤的缅甸，每天有超过 10 万人在至少 1,000 个诈骗中心从事电信诈骗。

Chinese police started to crack down on the fraud in September and this month, police launched what they said were "swift attacks" on crime gangs in Myanmar.翻译:中国警方从九月份开始打击诈骗活动，本月警方对缅甸的犯罪团伙发起了所谓的“迅速打击”。

The Myanmar ringleader of a gang committed suicide last week while on the run from Myanmar authorities, Chinese police said. Three members of his gang were later handed over to Chinese police.翻译:中国警方称，一名缅甸团伙头目上周在躲避缅甸当局追捕时自杀身亡。该团伙的三名成员后来被移交给中国警方。

With telecom scams in Myanmar targeting Chinese citizens surging, Assistant Foreign Minister Nong Rong visited Myanmar this month, saying China was ready to work with Myanmar on tackling cross-border crime including online gambling.翻译:随着缅甸针对中国公民的电信诈骗激增，外交部部长助理农融本月访问缅甸，表示中方已准备好与缅方合作打击包括网络赌博在内的跨境犯罪。

Nong also said China supported Myanmar in maintaining stability on their common border as Myanmar's junta battled insurgents in the area.翻译:农还表示，在缅甸军政府与该地区的叛乱分子作战之际，中国支持缅甸维护共同边界的稳定。

Myanmar's ruling military is facing attacks on multiple fronts in its borderlands as an alliance of ethnic minority insurgent groups combines with pro-democracy fighters to challenge the junta's rule.翻译:缅甸执政军队在边境地区面临多条战线的攻击，少数民族叛乱组织联盟与民主派战士联合起来挑战军政府的统治。

China has called for peace.翻译:中国呼吁和平。

"China has been playing a constructive role in its own way to promote peace talks and urge relevant parties to put the interests of the people first, cease fire and end war as soon as possible," a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Monday.翻译:外交部发言人周一表示：“中方一直以自己的方式发挥建设性作用，劝和促谈，敦促有关各方以人民利益为重，尽快停火止战。”

item.title: 专家调查：中国碳排放量将于2030年达到峰值
item.description:
China is on track to meet a goal to bring its climate-warming carbon dioxide emissions to a peak before 2030, according to a poll of 89 experts from industry and academia published on Tuesday, though questions remain over how high the top will be.翻译:周二公布的一项由来自工业界和学术界的 89 名专家参与的民意调查显示，中国有望实现在 2030 年之前使导致气候变暖的二氧化碳排放量达到峰值的目标，但峰值到底有多高仍存在疑问。

More than 70% of respondents said China, the world's biggest carbon dioxide emitter, will be able to meet the target, with two saying its emissions had already peaked, in a poll compiled by the Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air (CREA), a Helsinki-based think tank.翻译:能源与清洁空气研究中心 (CREA) 编制的一项民意调查显示，超过 70% 的受访者表示，作为全球最大的二氧化碳排放国，中国将能够实现这一目标，其中两人表示其排放量已经达到峰值是一家总部位于赫尔辛基的智库。

Still, "experts remain concerned about how high the peak emissions would reach compared to previous levels," CREA said, with a majority of respondents expecting the total to be at least 15% higher than the 2020 level.翻译:尽管如此，CREA 表示，“专家们仍然担心峰值排放量与之前的水平相比会达到多高”，大多数受访者预计排放总量将比 2020 年的水平至少高出 15%。

Doubts have been cast on China's ability to meet its 2030 pledge, as authorities continue to approve dozens of new coal-fired power stations to meet rising energy demand and avoid a repeat of the disruptive power outages that hit the country in 2021.翻译:人们对中国是否有能力兑现 2030 年的承诺表示怀疑，因为当局继续批准数十个新的燃煤发电站，以满足不断增长的能源需求，并避免重蹈 2021 年发生的破坏性停电的覆辙。

But CREA said respondents, including 64 based in China, were more optimistic about the country's ability to meet its goal compared to last year, with the majority believing post-pandemic economic conditions were accelerating the energy transition.翻译:但 CREA 表示，与去年相比，包括 64 名中国受访者在内的受访者对中国实现目标的能力更加乐观，大多数人认为大流行后的经济状况正在加速能源转型。

Half of the experts surveyed by CREA said they believed China would reach peak primary energy consumption before the end of this decade, though nearly a quarter still forecast it would continue to rise even after 2035.翻译:CREA 调查的一半专家表示，他们相信中国的一次能源消费将在本十年结束前达到峰值，但近四分之一的专家仍预测，即使在 2035 年之后，中国一次能源消费仍将继续增长。

China's reluctance to agree to a phasing-out of fossil fuels is expected to be a major sticking point at COP28 climate talks in Dubai starting next week, though Beijing is willing to agree to a new global plan to triple renewable energy capacity.翻译:尽管北京愿意同意一项将可再生能源产能增加两倍的新全球计划，但中国不愿同意逐步淘汰化石燃料预计将成为下周在迪拜举行的第28届联合国气候变化框架公约(COP28)气候谈判的一个主要症结所在。

China also said in an agreement with the U.S. that it would "accelerate the substitution for coal, oil and gas generation" in order to secure "meaningful absolute power sector emission reductions" this decade.翻译:中国还在与美国的一项协议中表示，将“加速替代煤炭、石油和天然气发电”，以确保本十年“电力行业绝对减排量大幅减少”。

CREA's lead analyst Lauri Myllyvirta said last week it was likely China's emissions would go into a "structural decline" from next year, with renewable sources capable of meeting new energy demand.翻译:CREA首席分析师劳里·米利维尔塔(Lauri Myllyvirta)上周表示，从明年开始，中国的排放量可能会进入“结构性下降” ，可再生能源能够满足新能源需求。

(This story has been corrected to state that emissions likely 'would go into' a decline next year, not 'had already gone into' a decline, in paragraph 9)翻译:（这个故事已被更正，指出明年排放量可能“将进入”下降，而不是“已经进入”下降，第 9 段）

item.title: 美国卡尔文森号航空母舰抵达韩国港口
item.description:
The U.S. aircraft carrier Carl Vinson arrived at a port in the South Korean city of Busan on Tuesday, in a show of extended deterrence against North Korea's nuclear and missile programs, South Korea's navy said.翻译:韩国海军表示，美国卡尔文森号航空母舰周二抵达韩国釜山的一个港口，以展示对朝鲜核计划和导弹计划的长期威慑。

The arrival comes as North Korea plans to launch a rocket carrying a space satellite between Nov. 22 and Dec. 1 in the direction of the Yellow Sea and East China Sea, according to Japan's Coast Guard,翻译:据日本海岸警卫队称，朝鲜计划在 11 月 22 日至 12 月 1 日期间向黄海和东海方向发射一枚运载太空卫星的火箭。

It would mark a third attempt by the nuclear-armed North this year to put a spy satellite into orbit.翻译:这将标志着拥有核武器的朝鲜今年第三次尝试将间谍卫星送入轨道。

In a statement, South Korean Rear Admiral Kim Ji-hoon said the arrival of the Carl Vinson showed a "strong combined defence posture and a determined willingness to respond to North Korea's advancing nuclear and missile threats" by the South Korea-U.S. alliance.翻译:韩国海军少将金智勋在一份声明中表示，卡尔文森号的抵达表明韩美联盟“强大的联合防御态势以及应对朝鲜不断推进的核和导弹威胁的坚定意愿”。

item.title: 中国混合动力汽车销量激增，对外国汽车制造商构成新的威胁
item.description:
As EV makers in China wage an intense price war to prop up slowing demand, Chinese brands with strong hybrid lineups are emerging as winners, attracting consumers with vehicles with long range that can cost less than gasoline cars.翻译:随着中国电动汽车制造商发动激烈的价格战以支撑不断放缓的需求，拥有强大混合动力产品线的中国品牌正在成为赢家，以比汽油车成本更低的长续航里程汽车吸引消费者。

The emerging trend may provide a glimmer of hope for global automakers such as Toyota (7203.T) and Honda who are pursuing "multi-pronged" electrification strategies, as electric vehicle (EV) sales lose momentum in Europe and the U.S., partly because of high auto financing costs.翻译:这一新兴趋势可能为丰田（7203.T）和本田等寻求“多管齐下”电气化战略的全球汽车制造商带来一线希望，因为电动汽车（EV）在欧洲和美国的销售失去动力，部分原因是汽车融资成本高。

One-third of total vehicle sales by Toyota, the world's top-selling automaker, are already hybrids and the company reported a 34% surge in hybrid sales in the six months to end-September, outpacing 9% growth in overall revenue.翻译:全球最畅销的汽车制造商丰田汽车总销量的三分之一已经是混合动力车，该公司报告称，截至 9 月底的六个月内，混合动力车销量猛增了 34%，超过了总收入 9% 的增幅。

Experts warn that foreign brands now face a growing threat from Chinese rivals that have conquered the domestic hybrid market and are looking overseas, emboldened by their strength as the world's lowest-cost EV producer after heavy investment in supply chains.翻译:专家警告说，外国品牌现在面临着来自中国竞争对手日益增长的威胁，这些竞争对手已经征服了国内混合动力市场，并在对供应链进行大量投资后，凭借作为全球成本最低的电动汽车生产商的实力，将目光投向海外。

In the United States, most hybrid powertrains sell at a $1,500 to $2,000 premium to combustion models, but in China, some hybrids are offered at a slight discount to gasoline models and can be as much as 23% cheaper than pure EVs.翻译:在美国，大多数混合动力总成的售价比内燃机车型高出 1,500 至 2,000 美元，但在中国，一些混合动力车型的售价比汽油车型略有折扣，并且比纯电动汽车便宜 23%。

That price advantage is driving Chinese consumers to hybrid models, which work almost like pure EVs when they are used for short daily commutes, consuming little gasoline, analysts said.翻译:分析师表示，这种价格优势正在促使中国消费者购买混合动力车型，这种车型在日常短途通勤时几乎与纯电动汽车一样，消耗的汽油很少。

"People are increasingly accepting that a car can be equipped with both an electric motor and a gasoline engine, as they are highly complementary," said Xu Min, a professor at Shanghai Jiao Tong University's Institute of Intelligent Vehicle. "Wherever the gasoline engine is low in efficiency, we can make up for it with the electric motor."翻译:上海交通大学智能汽车研究所教授徐敏表示：“人们越来越接受汽车可以同时配备电动机和汽油发动机，因为它们具有很强的互补性。” “凡是汽油机效率低的地方，我们都可以用电动机来弥补。”

Two types of hybrids – plug-in hybrid (PHEV) and extended-range hybrid (EREV) - are enjoying strong demand, with their combined shipments surging 85% and outpacing a 14% growth in pure electric car sales this year, industry data showed.翻译:行业数据显示，插电式混合动力汽车 (PHEV) 和增程混合动力汽车 (EREV) 两种混合动力汽车的需求强劲，今年它们的总出货量猛增 85%，超过纯电动汽车销量 14% 的增幅。

The popularity of these hybrids is so strong that the segment is now half as big as the pure EV market and accounts for 12% of total passenger vehicle sales, according to data from China Association of Automobile Manufacturers (CAAM).翻译:根据中国汽车工业协会 (CAAM) 的数据，这些混合动力汽车非常受欢迎，目前该细分市场的规模是纯电动汽车市场的一半，占乘用车总销量的 12%。

Li Auto (2015.HK), the most popular extended-range hybrid seller in China, has thousands of customers waiting for delivery of its new large SUVs, a stark contrast with many other brands grappling with an unsold inventory buildup.翻译:理想汽车（2015.HK）是中国最受欢迎的增程式混合动力汽车销售商，有数千名客户等待其新款大型SUV的交付，这与许多其他品牌陷入未售出库存积压的情况形成鲜明对比。

"The extended-range hybrids are the best option for Chinese drivers who want ... a solution to driving range anxiety, better fuel efficiency, smarter driving features and lower prices," said Yale Zhang, managing director at the consultancy Automotive Foresight.翻译:咨询公司Automotive Foresight的董事总经理张耶鲁表示：“对于想要解决行驶里程焦虑、提高燃油效率、更智能的驾驶功能和更低的价格的中国驾驶员来说，增程式混合动力车是最佳选择。”

In the PHEV market, BYD has cemented its position as the most dominant player, with eight of the 10 top-selling plug-in hybrid cars in China among its offerings.翻译:在插电式混合动力汽车市场，比亚迪巩固了其主导地位，中国最畅销的 10 款插电式混合动力汽车中，比亚迪占据了 8 款。

A PHEV can be driven directly by the electric motor or the gasoline engine. An EREV has a larger battery pack and runs on electricity only, with its gasoline engine serving as a power bank to recharge the batteries when they run low.

CHINA THREAT

The growing popularity of PHEVs and EREVs from Chinese firms, which dominated the top 10 best-selling EREV or PHEV models, have not only affected sales of gasoline cars but also gasoline hybrid vehicles (HEV), a segment Toyota pioneered with the Prius in late 1990s.翻译:中国企业的 PHEV 和 EREV 日益普及，占据了最畅销 EREV 或 PHEV 车型前十名，这不仅影响了汽油车的销售，还影响了丰田在普锐斯 (Prius) 上率先推出的汽油混合动力汽车 (HEV) 领域的销量。 20 世纪 90 年代。

Sales of HEVs in China, which Toyota still dominates with four top-selling models, tumbled 15%, while gasoline car sales dropped 11%, underscoring potential challenges facing foreign automakers.翻译:丰田在中国仍以四款最畅销车型占据主导地位的混合动力汽车销量下降了 15%，而汽油车销量下降了 11%，凸显了外国汽车制造商面临的潜在挑战。

HEVs use gasoline for the main powertrain and come with a relatively small battery pack that is recharged during braking and used for auxiliary power. The sales slump for that type in China is partly a result of from government policy, which favours battery-driven hybrids by offering tax cuts for EVs, PHEVs and EREVs.翻译:混合动力汽车使用汽油作为主要动力系统，并配备相对较小的电池组，在制动过程中充电并用作辅助动力。中国此类车型销量下滑的部分原因是政府政策，该政策通过为电动汽车、插电式混合动力汽车和增程式电动汽车提供减税政策来支持电池驱动的混合动力汽车。

A foreign automaker was the first to crack the EREV market in China, only to cede it to local rivals: in 2017, General Motors (GM.N) launched the Buick Velite 5 as the first extended-range hybrid in China, two years before Li Auto started volume production.翻译:一家外国汽车制造商率先打入中国增程式电动车市场，结果却将其拱手让给了本土竞争对手：2017 年，通用汽车(GM.N)推出了别克 Velite 5，这是中国首款增程混合动力车，两年前理想汽车开始量产。

But it was a failed trial, with sales of just over 4,000 units, and GM in 2020 halted sales. By contrast, Li Auto sold 244,225 EREVs in the first nine months of 2023.翻译:但这次尝试失败了，销量仅超过 4000 辆，通用汽车于 2020 年停止了销售。相比之下，理想汽车在 2023 年前 9 个月售出了 244,225 辆增程式电动汽车。

The struggle of the likes of GM and Toyota is a stark reminder of growing threats posed by Chinese rivals now looking to export markets for growth.翻译:通用汽车和丰田等公司的困境清楚地提醒人们，现在寻求出口市场寻求增长的中国竞争对手所构成的威胁越来越大。

BYD is expanding PHEV sales overseas, offering Han, Qin and Song lineups in Latin America, which has less charging infrastructure.翻译:比亚迪正在扩大插电式混合动力汽车的海外销售，在充电基础设施较少的拉丁美洲提供汉、秦和宋系列产品。

Stellantis (STLAM.MI) is investing $1.6 billion in Leapmotor and is interested in bringing the Chinese partner’s EREV hybrids to Europe, according to people with knowledge of the matter.翻译:据知情人士透露，Stellantis (STLAM.MI)正在向零跑汽车投资 16 亿美元，并有兴趣将中国合作伙伴的 EREV 混合动力车引入欧洲。

Stellantis told Reuters it does not exclude the possibility of cooperation with Leapmotor on new energy technology products. Leapmotor did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:Stellantis向路透社表示，不排除与零跑汽车在新能源技术产品上进行合作的可能性。零跑汽车没有回应置评请求。

Xu at Jiao Tong University, however, noted that the difference in driver demands across markets could affect demand for Chinese cars.翻译:然而，交通大学的徐指出，不同市场驾驶员需求的差异可能会影响对中国汽车的需求。

In North America, for example, consumers would look for cars with bigger horsepower to tow trailers, enabling a bigger popularity for HEVs.翻译:例如，在北美，消费者会寻找马力更大的汽车来牵引拖车，从而使混合动力汽车更加普及。

Still some are sceptical of the HEV's longer-term future.翻译:但仍有一些人对混合动力汽车的长期未来持怀疑态度。

"Conventional hybrid (HEV) is breathing life into a dying patient - the gasoline engine," said Bill Russo, CEO of Shanghai-based advisory firm Automobility.翻译:上海咨询公司 Automobility 首席执行官比尔·拉索 (Bill Russo) 表示：“传统混合动力 (HEV) 正在为垂死的病人——汽油发动机注入生命。”
